member.name: M:Laravel.Sdk.LaravelApp.#ctor(Pchp.Core.Context)
member.summary: Minimal constructor that initializes runtime context. The .ctor is called implicitly by derived PHP class.

member.name: F:Laravel.Sdk.LaravelApp._ctx
member.summary: Runtime context of the application. Special signature recognized by the compiler.

member.name: T:Laravel.Sdk.LaravelLoader
member.summary: Object used to be called from Laravel code, instantiated into a global PHP variable $peachpie_laravel_loader.

member.name: M:Laravel.Sdk.LaravelLoader.InternalAppStarted(Laravel.Sdk.LaravelApp)
member.summary: Invoked by PHP plugin implementation (peachpie-api.php) to bridge into .NET.
